import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import c from './Basket.module.scss' import cl from 'classnames' import { StateContext } from '../../context/context'; export const CartItem = ({product,setProduct,products}) => { const [amout,setAmount]=useState(1); const {state,removeOrder}=useContext(StateContext) return (<>
{product.img &&}
{product.name}
{amout}
{product.price} ₴ {product.price * amout} ₴
) }
